text: The General Council of the Trades Union Congress should therefore consider the matter. Consideration should also be given to the regrouping of unions and the modification of their structures to meet the growing concentration of capital. Mr. unions serving workers in the same industry - along with common benefits paid during strikes and lock-outs.
